name: 180heartbeats
tagline: We believe in the power of innovation.
description:
180heartbeats is an independent interactive agency from the Vistula. We plan, create, and fine tune communication that excites. We work for local and international brands and believe in the power of innovation.
We create brand excitement by planning, executing, and perfecting emotional experiences. We work with local and international brands to make their consumers' hearts beat faster.
